summary.span: 为 和 对象提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for both and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含文件和目录操作通用的方法。The class contains methods that are common to file and directory manipulation. 对象可以表示文件或目录，从而作为 或 对象的基础。A object can represent either a file or a directory, thus serving as the basis for or objects. 分析大量文件和目录时，请使用此基类。Use this base class when parsing a lot of files and directories. 仅当派生类具有 枚举的 AllAccess 权限时，派生类才能从 继承。A derived class can inherit from only if the derived class has the AllAccess permission from the enumeration. 在接受路径的成员中，路径可以引用文件或只引用目录。In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory. 指定的路径还可以引用服务器和共享名称的相对路径或通用命名约定（UNC）路径。The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name. 例如，以下所有内容都是可接受的路径：For example, all the following are acceptable paths: - "c：\\\MyDir\\" 中C#的 "\MyFile.txt" 或 "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" 中的 Visual Basic。"c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic. - Visual Basic 中的 "c：\\C#\MyDir" 或 "c:\MyDir"。"c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic. - Visual Basic 中的 "MyDir\\C#\MySubdir" 或 "MyDir\MySubDir"。"MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic. - \\中的 "\\\\\\\MyServer\\C#\MyShare" 或 "Visual Basic \MyServer\MyShare"。"\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic. 有关常见 i/o 任务的列表，请参阅[常见 I/o 任务](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何遍历所有文件和目录，并查询有关每个条目的某些信息。The following example shows how to loop through all the files and directories, querying some information about each entry. [!code-cpp[FileSystemInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/cpp/program.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[FileSystemInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FileSystemInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/VB/FileSystemInfo.vb#1)]

member this.Attributes : System.IO.FileAttributes with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前文件或目录的特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes for the current file or directory.
of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 对象的当前实例从以下任意 方法返回，则 属性的值将被预先缓存：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 如果访问值本身或其他 属性，则可能会缓存该值。The value may be cached when either the value itself or other properties are accessed. 若要获取最新值，请调用 方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果路径在上次缓存状态中不存在，则返回值为 `(FileAttributes)(-1)`。If the path doesn't exist as of the last cached state, the return value is `(FileAttributes)(-1)`. 仅当设置值时才能引发 或 。 or can only be thrown when setting the value. 此属性的值是存档、压缩、目录、隐藏、脱机、只读、系统和临时文件属性标志的组合。The value of this property is a combination of the archive, compressed, directory, hidden, offline, read-only, system, and temporary file attribute flags. 设置此值时，请使用按位 OR 运算符（`|` 中C#的或 `Or` 在 Visual Basic 中）以应用多个值。When you set this value, use the bitwise OR operator (`|` in C# or `Or` in Visual Basic) to apply more than one value. 若要保留 属性中的任何现有值，请在赋值中包括 属性的值。To retain any existing values in the property, include the value of the property in your assignment. 例如：For example: `exampleFile.Attributes = exampleFile.Attributes | FileAttributes.ReadOnly;` ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 的属性。The following example demonstrates the property. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/cpp/program.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/VB/FileSystemInfo.vb#2)]

span.span: For example, it's on an unmapped drive.

exception.span: 仅在设置属性值时引发。

span.span: .NET Core only: The user attempts to set an attribute value but doesn't have write permission.

exception.span: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

span.span: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime CreationTime { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };
member this.CreationTime : DateTime with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前文件或目录的创建时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the creation time of the current file or directory.

value.span: 当前 对象的创建日期和时间。

span.span: The creation date and time of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能会返回不正确的值，因为它使用的本机函数的值可能不会持续由操作系统进行更新。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 如果 对象的当前实例从以下任意 方法返回，则 属性的值将被预先缓存：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用 方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果 对象中所述的文件不存在，则此属性返回12:00 年1月 1601 1 日午夜If the file described in the object does not exist, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. 公元协调世界时（UTC），调整为本地时间。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. 在不支持创建或出生时间的 Unix 平台上，此属性将返回上次状态更改和上次修改时间的较早时间。On Unix platforms that do not support creation or birth time, this property returns the older of the time of the last status change and the time of the last modification. 在其他平台上，它返回12:00 年1月1日午夜1601On other platforms, it returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. 公元协调世界时（UTC），调整为本地时间。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. NTFS 格式的驱动器可能会在短时间内缓存文件元信息，如文件创建时间。NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time. 此过程称为文件隧道。This process is known as file tunneling. 因此，如果要覆盖或替换现有文件，可能需要显式设置文件的创建时间。As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 的属性。The following example demonstrates the property. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/cpp/program.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/VB/FileSystemInfo.vb#2)]

span.span: The specified path is invalid; for example, it is on an unmapped drive.

exception.span: 当前操作系统不是 Windows NT 或更高版本。

span.span: The current operating system is not Windows NT or later.

exception.span: 调用方试图设置无效的创建时间。

span.span: The caller attempts to set an invalid creation time.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前文件或目录的创建时间，其格式为协调世界时 (UTC)。

span.span: Gets or sets the creation time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), of the current file or directory.

value.span: 当前 对象的创建日期及时间（UTC 格式）。

span.span: The creation date and time in UTC format of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能会返回不正确的值，因为它使用的本机函数的值可能不会持续由操作系统进行更新。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 如果 对象的当前实例从以下任意 方法返回，则 属性的值将被预先缓存：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用 方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果 对象中所述的文件不存在，则此属性返回12:00 年1月 1601 1 日午夜If the file described in the object does not exist, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. 公元协调世界时（UTC）。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在不支持创建或出生时间的 Unix 平台上，此属性将返回上次状态更改和上次修改时间的较早时间。On Unix platforms that do not support creation or birth time, this property returns the older of the time of the last status change and the time of the last modification. 在其他平台上，它返回12:00 年1月1日午夜1601On other platforms, it returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. 公元协调世界时（UTC），调整为本地时间。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. NTFS 格式的驱动器可能会在短时间内缓存文件元信息，如文件创建时间。NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time. 此过程称为文件隧道。This process is known as file tunneling. 因此，如果要覆盖或替换现有文件，可能需要显式设置文件的创建时间。As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.

span.span: A string containing the extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Extension` 属性返回 扩展，包括句点（.）。The `Extension` property returns the extension, including the period (.). 例如，对于 c:\NewFile.txt 文件，此属性将返回 ".txt"。For example, for a file c:\NewFile.txt, this property returns ".txt". 下表列出了其他典型或相关 i/o 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](/dotnet/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](/dotnet/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file)| |读取文本文件。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](/dotnet/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file)| |检索文件的完全限定路径。Retrieve the fully qualified path of a file.|| |仅检索路径中的文件名。Retrieve only the file name a path.|| |仅检索路径中的目录名称。Retrieve only the directory name from a path.|| |更改文件的扩展名。Change the extension of a file.||

summary.span: 获取或设置上次访问当前文件或目录的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time the current file or directory was last accessed.

value.span: 上次访问当前文件或目录的时间。

span.span: The time that the current file or directory was last accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能会返回不正确的值，因为它使用的本机函数的值可能不会持续由操作系统进行更新。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 如果 对象中所述的文件不存在，则此属性返回12:00 年1月 1601 1 日午夜If the file described in the object does not exist, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. 公元协调世界时（UTC），调整为本地时间。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. 如果 对象的当前实例从以下任意 方法返回，则 属性的值将被预先缓存：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用 方法。To get the latest value, call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过 "touch" 操作更新 属性。The following code example demonstrates the updating of the property through a "touch" operation. 在此示例中，文件被 "触摸"，将 、 和 属性更新为当前日期和时间。In this example, the file is "touched", updating the , and properties to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch/cs/touch.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch/vb/touch.vb#00)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime LastAccessTimeUtc { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };
member this.LastAccessTimeUtc : DateTime with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置上次访问当前文件或目录的时间，其格式为协调世界时 (UTC)。

span.span: Gets or sets the time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), that the current file or directory was last accessed.

value.span: 上次访问当前文件或目录的 UTC 时间。

span.span: The UTC time that the current file or directory was last accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能会返回不正确的值，因为它使用的本机函数的值可能不会持续由操作系统进行更新。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 如果 对象的当前实例从以下任意 方法返回，则 属性的值将被预先缓存：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用 方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果 对象中所述的文件不存在，则此属性返回12:00 年1月 1601 1 日午夜If the file described in the object does not exist, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. 公元协调世界时（UTC）。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 有关常见 i/o 任务的列表，请参阅[常见 I/o 任务](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime LastWriteTime { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };
member this.LastWriteTime : DateTime with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置上次写入当前文件或目录的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time when the current file or directory was last written to.

value.span: 上次写入当前文件的时间。

span.span: The time the current file was last written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能会返回不正确的值，因为它使用的本机函数的值可能不会持续由操作系统进行更新。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 如果 对象的当前实例从以下任意 方法返回，则 属性的值将被预先缓存：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用 方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果 对象中所述的文件或目录不存在，或者包含此文件或目录的文件系统不支持此信息，则此属性将返回12:00 年1月 1601 1 日午夜If the file or directory described in the object does not exist, or if the file system that contains this file or directory does not support this information, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. 公元协调世界时（UTC），调整为本地时间。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过 "touch" 操作更新 属性。The following code example demonstrates the updating of the property through a "touch" operation. 在此示例中，文件被 "触摸"，将 、 和 属性更新为当前日期和时间。In this example, the file is "touched", updating the , and properties to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch/cs/touch.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch/vb/touch.vb#00)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能会返回不正确的值，因为它使用的本机函数的值可能不会持续由操作系统进行更新。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 如果 对象的当前实例从以下任意 方法返回，则 属性的值将被预先缓存：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用 方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果 对象中所述的文件或目录不存在，或者包含此文件或目录的文件系统不支持此信息，则此属性将返回12:00 年1月 1601 1 日午夜If the file or directory described in the object does not exist, or if the file system that contains this file or directory does not support this information, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. 公元协调世界时（UTC）。(C.E.) MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 对于文件，获取该文件的名称。

span.span: For files, gets the name of the file.

summary.span: 对于目录，如果存在层次结构，则获取层次结构中最后一个目录的名称。

span.span: For directories, gets the name of the last directory in the hierarchy if a hierarchy exists.

summary.span: 否则， 属性获取该目录的名称。

span.span: Otherwise, the property gets the name of the directory.

value.span: 一个字符串，它是父目录的名称、层次结构中最后一个目录的名称或文件的名称（包括文件扩展名）。

span.span: A string that is the name of the parent directory, the name of the last directory in the hierarchy, or the name of a file, including the file name extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于目录，`Name` 仅返回父目录的名称，如 Dir，而不返回 c:\Dir。For a directory, `Name` returns only the name of the parent directory, such as Dir, not c:\Dir. 对于子目录，`Name` 仅返回子目录的名称，如 Sub1，而不是 c:\Dir\Sub1。For a subdirectory, `Name` returns only the name of the subdirectory, such as Sub1, not c:\Dir\Sub1. 对于文件，`Name` 仅返回文件名和文件扩展名，例如 Myfile.txt，而不是 c:\Dir\Myfile.txt。For a file, `Name` returns only the file name and file name extension, such as MyFile.txt, not c:\Dir\Myfile.txt.

span.span: File and Stream I/O
How to: Read Text from a File
How to: Write Text to a File

summary.span: 最初由用户指定的目录（不论是相对目录还是绝对目录）。

span.span: The path originally specified by the user, whether relative or absolute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关常见 i/o 任务的列表，请参阅[常见 I/o 任务](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 刷新对象的状态。

span.span: Refreshes the state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileSystemInfo.Refresh` 获取当前文件系统中的文件快照。`FileSystemInfo.Refresh` takes a snapshot of the file from the current file system. 即使文件系统返回不正确或过时的信息，`Refresh` 也不能更正基础文件系统。`Refresh` cannot correct the underlying file system even if the file system returns incorrect or outdated information. 这可能发生在 Windows 98 等平台上。This can happen on platforms such as Windows 98. 尝试获取属性信息之前，必须对 `Refresh` 进行调用，否则信息将过时。Calls must be made to `Refresh` before attempting to get the attribute information, or the information will be outdated.

exception.span: 设备（如磁盘驱动器）未准备好。

span.span: A device such as a disk drive is not ready.
File and Stream I/O
How to: Read Text from a File
How to: Write Text to a File

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回原始路径。

span.span: Returns the original path.

summary.span: 使用 或 属性作为完整路径或文件/目录名。

span.span: Use the or properties for the full path or file/directory name.

returns.span: 一个包括原始路径的字符串。

span.span: A string with the original path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > `ToString` 方法返回的字符串表示传递到实现 的类的构造函数的路径。The string returned by the`ToString` method represents the path that was passed to the constructor of the class implementing . 你应根据你的意图检索以下任一属性的值，而不是调用 `ToString` 方法：Instead of calling the `ToString` method, you should retrieve the value of either of the following properties, depending on your intent: > - ，以获取文件或目录的名称，而不包含任何父路径信息。, to get the name of the file or directory, without any parent path information. > - ，以获取文件或目录的完全限定路径。, to get the fully qualified path of the file or directory.
